channel.title: Devil Island Beta Dev. Team
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i40.photobucket.com/albums/e239/Evilkiller49/Devil-Island-Beta.gif[/img]
Forums : http://devilisland.smfforfree3.com
Devil Island Beta IS BACK
I will be needing some new staff
use this form to apply [code] What job: What expirience: Post 3 tuts..(give me proof of it): Ur msn/aim/yahoo(for to get in connection): [/code]
And if ur an hoster
[code] How long u be able to host What ham/no-ip(i prefer no-ip) [/code]
Server coders: - Myself - None - None
Webclient maker: -R1ch kid
Client maker(must be able to run Pest control) -R1ch kid
A Hoster(must be able to run 15/7 No-ip) - Carney(w00t) :D
[color=black]Features - Full pc - Runecrafting - Mining - Woodcutting(worked on)
Things i like to have
- Some randoms - Castle wars - Deul arena - Fight pits.. - Quests - Some thing like the wild in rs :) - More skills
[color=red]Hope we can make this a good server
Thnx
Devil Island Dev. Team
